title: Railworks TS2014 AP39  WCML Over Shap Scenario Pack (Freight)
description:
Armstrong Powerhouse presents a scenario pack for the excellent West Coast Main Line Over Shap route. This pack contains nine scenarios based in the modern era (2010 to 2014) and covers a wide variety of freight workings. From hauling a rake of car carriers with EWS liveried 92031, to a ballast train with two heritage class 37 locomotives, there's something for everyone in this pack.

In these scenarios, we've strived for realism in all areas. For example, each scenario uses the timetable of its relevant year to create an as realistic experience as possible. As well as this, realistic formations are used with most services having their headcode, time of leaving, origin and destination as their name so you can see which train is which!

All efforts have been made to ensure these scenarios work properly but there is a small possibility that one scenario may not work on a particular setup, and if so, we will try our best to fix it.

Requirements

Extra Stock - Download

Armstrong Powerhouse Class 142 Diesel Multiple Unit Pack 

Armstrong Powerhouse HHA Wagon Pack 

Armstrong Powerhouse HIA Wagon Pack 

Just Trains Autoballaster JJA PlusPak 

Just Trains Cargowaggon Flat IGA PlusPak
